flagLifetime.description: The number of seconds a flag is valid for

flagRegex.description: The regex that flags must match

submissionSendsWelcomeBanner.description: Whether the submission service sends a welcome banner

submissionPeriod.description: The number of seconds between submissions

submissionFlagLimit.description: The number of flags a submitter can submit in a single cycle

submissionPath.description: If the submission service is via HTTP, the path to the submission service

submissionExePath.description: If submissionProtocol is set to EXTERNAL, the path to the submission executable

serverHost.description: The IP which this server will bind to

serverPort.description: The port which this server will bind to
